name: ShapeFlip!
description:
ShapeFlip is a game with simple rules, but they are not told to you - you must figure them out by solving puzzles.

Made for Ludum Dare #35 - Theme "Shapeshift"

Please Note: All donations for my games go directly to support the Technology Cooperative, a 501c3 nonprofit organization founded to create a technology-focused community that provides computer-related technology access and awareness.
